name: The Infinity Project
description:
'''The Infinity Project''' (TIP) was a British 1990s [[goa trance]] band. Members included [[Raja Ram (musician)|Raja Ram]], Graham Wood and Anjee Sian, with [[Simon Posford]] occasionally working with them. Other contributors include Martin Freeland ([[Man with No Name (musician)|Man With No Name]]) and Nick Barber ([[Doof (musician)|Doof]]).

In 1994, Infinity Project members Graham Wood and [[Raja Ram (musician)|Raja Ram]], along with Ian St Paul founded the record label TIP Records.
